definition: Tongxin county in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
to be of one mind/united/concentric
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
of one mind (idiom)
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
Tongxin county in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
concerted efforts in a common cause (idiom); united and working together

sentences.english: Splendid cake, covered with cupids, silver, and true-lover's knots.
sentences.chinese: 用愛神，銀紙，同心結等裝飾着的上等蛋糕。

sentences.english: Then we hand in hand together, with our solidarity of hands.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們攜手同心，用我們同舟共濟的雙手。

sentences.english: Inspiration is necessary to inculcate the sense of unity, and to create economic ideals.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸同心協力的認識，創造經濟理想也是需要靈感的。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該同心協力以援助遭水災的災民。

sentences.english: But nevertheless, the people expect us to work together.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，人民希望我們戮力同心。

sentences.english: We must come together to end this war successfully.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須爲順利結束這場戰爭同心協力。

sentences.english: Instead tastes are a series of concentric rings, like ripples in a pond.
sentences.chinese: 品味這時成了一系列同心圓，如同池塘裏的水波。

sentences.english: Let us work together to protect their innovation, and that of future generations.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們同心協力保護他們以及子孫後代的創新成果。

sentences.english: If we rally round, we can overcome our present troubles.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們同心協力，就能克服我們當前的困難。

sentences.english: Between them they can finish the job in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 他們同心協力，可以在幾天內完成這件工作。

sentences.english: The cox should organize and encourage all oar men to work together.
sentences.chinese: 舵手必須組織和鼓勵所有艇員同心協力進行比賽。

sentences.english: Eight salute to heaven and earth, let the heavens and the earth for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 八門禮炮告天地，同心同德天地久。

sentences.english: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.
sentences.chinese: 他們同心合意，將自己的能力權柄給那獸。

sentences.english: Let us, then, fellow-citizens, unite with one heart and one mind.
sentences.chinese: 因此，公民們，讓我們同心同德地團結起來。

sentences.english: Plus the motor shaft axis, concentricity absolutely right and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 泵軸爲電機加長軸，同心度決對可靠。

sentences.english: If two people are of the same mind, their sharpness can cut through metal. '
sentences.chinese: 《易經》中一句話“二人同心，其利斷金”。

definition: to be of one mind/to work as one
of one mind (idiom)
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
to walk hand in hand/to cooperate
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
acting together/to one's liking
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
concerted efforts in a common cause (idiom); united and working together
to unite in common effort
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder
trials and tribulations
to stick together through thick and thin (idiom)
to share joys and sorrows/sharing good times and hard times/same as 同甘共苦
linked in a chain
sincerity/absolute good faith
